p: Multan is located in the southern part of Punjab province in Pakistan. Multan features an arid climate with very hot summers and cold winters. Multan has four seasons: winter (December-February), summer (May-Sep), autumn (Oct-Nov) and spring (Mar-Apr) without a rainy season[ 14]. The city witnesses some of the most extreme temperatures in the country. Being close to the deserts, it has seen some of the worst heat waves in the history of Pakistan with scanty rainfall.
